org.drip.analytics.definition

Class FXForwardCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.service.stream.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.definition.FXForwardCurve
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Curve
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DerivedFXForwardCurve

    public abstract class FXForwardCurve
extends Serializer
implements Curve
    This abstract class contains the stub functionality for the term structure of dates/times and FX forwards (PIP/outright), and Spot FX info for the given currency pair.

        valParam - ValuationParams
        dcNum - Discount Curve Numerator
